DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy tolerability/comfort brimonidine/timolol dorzolamide/timolol patient open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension . In investigator mask randomisation process , subject allocate receive either brimonidine/timolol dorzolamide/timolol fixed-combination monotherapy adjunctive prostaglandin analogue period 12 week . After screen , patient return baseline , Month 1 Month 3 ophthalmic evaluation .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Fixed Combinations Brimonidine/Timolol Dorzolamide/Timolol Subjects With Open-Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
